quote: I was going to tell you a joke about time travel, but you guys didn't like it.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I have a photographic memory, but I always forget to bring the film.
author: Jason Statham

quote: Why did the chicken cross the road? To get away from Jason Statham.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I used to play piano by ear. Now I use my hands.
author: Jason Statham

quote: Why do we tell actors to 'break a leg'? Because every play has a cast.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I told my wife she was becoming a helicopter. She didn't appreciate the feedback.
author: Jason Statham

quote: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I used to play piano by ear. Now I use my hands.
author: Jason Statham

quote: I was going to be a comedian, but I lacked the confidence to tell jokes to an audience. So I became an actor and just pretended I was funny.
author: Jason Statham
